title: Train a PerpetualBooster model — perpetual
text: Perpetual self-generalizing gradient boosting machine need hyperparameter optimization. automatically finds best configuration based provided budget.

title: Train a PerpetualBooster model — perpetual
code: perpetual(   x,   y,   objective = "LogLoss",   budget = NULL,   iteration_limit = NULL,   stopping_rounds = NULL,   max_bin = NULL,   num_threads = NULL,   missing = NULL,   allow_missing_splits = NULL,   create_missing_branch = NULL,   missing_node_treatment = NULL,   log_iterations = NULL,   quantile = NULL,   reset = NULL,   timeout = NULL,   memory_limit = NULL,   seed = NULL,   ... )

title: Train a PerpetualBooster model — perpetual
text: x matrix data.frame features. y vector targets (numeric regression, factor/integer classification). objective string specifying objective function. Default "LogLoss". budget numeric value ensuring training time exceed budget (normalized units). iteration_limit integer limit number iterations. stopping_rounds integer early stopping. max_bin Integer, max number bins histograms. num_threads Integer, number threads use. missing Value consider missing data. Default NaN. allow_missing_splits Boolean. create_missing_branch Boolean. Whether create separate branch missing values (ternary trees). missing_node_treatment String. handle weights missing nodes create_missing_branch True. Options: "None", "AssignToParent", "AverageLeafWeight", "AverageNodeWeight". log_iterations Integer. quantile Numeric. reset Boolean. timeout Numeric. memory_limit Numeric. seed Integer seed reproducibility. ... Additional arguments.
